item.title: Seamless Security: Smartcard Logon from Entra-Only Machines to domain-joined Servers or AVDs
item.description: There’s still life in the old dog yet: Even though many consider smart cards as obsolete, with MFA phishing becoming an increasing significant threat, this authentication method is experiencing a renaissance. In other scenarios, smart cards are regulatory requirements or simply a phishing-resistant MFA method which has already been deployed to every user in the organization and only needs to be extended to the cloud.
